name: Anti-ficial Intelligence
description:
Controls

AD – move left/right

Space – jump

S – speed up the dynamo-elevator (works only if you’re standing on it)

Details

Program the Robot by teaching him proper functions! Eat green lines of code and shoot down red lines of code! You are a small Neurobot inside the Robot’s brain – the so-called Artificial Intelligence responsible for so-called Machine Learning. You control the Robot by stepping on three buttons. The Robot can change lanes and shoot down bugged (red) code.

IMPORTANT! The buttons need power – the moving platform in the middle acts as a dynamo. Remember to keep it away from the top position to keep the power up!

Story

We need to teach our new military robot a set of 8 new functions. It’s a matter of national security! As for the robot’s artificial intelligence… Well, it’s not as artificial as you think. You're it!

Credits:

Robot Platform Pack by Edu (itch.io)

Sci-fi platformer tileset | OpenGameArt.org
